user_query: I'm planning a trip to Europe and I want to convert 1000 USD to Euros. Can you provide me with the current exchange rate? Also, give me the latest news on cryptocurrencies to stay informed during my travels.

TaskList.description: Fetch the current exchange rate for USD to Euro.
Convert 1000 USD to Euros using the exchange rate from step 1.
Retrieve the latest news on cryptocurrencies.
